name: Coin98 Finance
introduce: Coin98 is a DeFi gateway for TraFi users to access any DeFi services on multiple blockchains, such as decentralized exchanges, lending protocols, on-chain governance, blockchain-based games, and cross-chain transfer on over 20 networks such as Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche, and more. Coin98's ecosystem of DeFi Products includes Coin98 Wallet, Coin98 Exchange, Space Gate, Saros Finance.
